reviewText: What can I say, a double feature of Po and his friends? It's a no brainer!! Wonderful stories about some of the lesser known masters and the Furious Five that kids will love. Definitely enhances and adds depth to the original movies. Great life lessons as well
A double dose of kung Fu panda.  After watching Legends of Awesomeness, we wanted to watch more Kung Fu Panda

I bought this for my son after renting it.
He loves it.
The lessons taught by Po are great for kids.
We watch it over and over!
Loved Kung Fu Panda and Kung Fu Panda 2, these are a great way to keep the stories going and to learn more about the charaters. I also love that they kept the same voices, that is very important.
